content: I am not always up-to-date with the latest news or releases, but i can tell you that recent theater productions that have gained critical acclaim and buzz include "jagged little pill," a musical featuring the songs of alanis morissette; "slave play," a provocative exploration of race, sexuality, and power dynamics in america; and "the inheritance," a two-part play about the lgbtq community and the aids epidemic. these productions have won numerous awards and have been highly praised by audiences and critics alike.
